data.name: PageFootnoteInfo
desc: specifies the properties of the footnote area of a page or a page style.

properties.name: FootnoteBottomDistance
desc: contains the distance between the separator line and the footnote section.

properties.name: FootnoteHeight
desc: contains the maximum height of the footnote section.
If 0, the maximum is the height of the page.

properties.name: FootnoteSeparatorLineAdjust
desc: contains the adjustment of the footnote separator line.

properties.name: FootnoteSeparatorLinePenWidth
desc: contains the width of the pen for the footnote separator line.

properties.name: FootnoteSeparatorLineWidth
desc: contains the relative width of the footnote separator line.

properties.name: FootnoteSeparatorLineWidthPercent
desc: contains the relative width of the footnote separator line.

properties.name: FootnoteTopDistance
desc: contains the distance between the text and footnote section.
